abbreviations - this pattern is written in us terminology st/sts stitch/stitches slip_stitch slip_stitch chain chain single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet back loop front loop tools and materials - 5 mm crochet hook - bernat premium #4 worsted medium yarn - orange and white - yarn needle - scissors - stuffing final size - tissue box size of - length 22 5 cm height 7 cm and width 12 cm technical notes *make sure the arms back rest and pillows are stuffed *at the end of each round is a stitch count in brackets *stitch count does not include chains or slip stitches *link to the youtube video is at the bottom of the pattern top of box orange make 2 row 1 chain 35 start in the second chain from the hook make 1 half_double_crochet in each chain across 34 sts row 2-5 chain 1 turn make 1 half_double_crochet in each st across 34 sts *row 6 does not go all the way across row 6-9 chain 1 turn make 1 half_double_crochet in the first 5 sts 5 sts *fasten_off sew the two together to make an opening for the tissue then sew the top to the base base orange row 1 chain 13 start in the second chain from the hook make 1 single_crochet in each chain across 12 sts *work in the back loop for every row row 2-108 chain 1 turn make 1 single_crochet in each st across 12 sts *fasten_off and sew the two edges together to make the base of the box then sew the top on arm rests orange make 2 round 1 make a magic_ring chain 2 into the magic circle make 10 double_crochet join with a slip_stitch 10 sts round 2 chain 1 make 2 single_crochet in each st around join with a slip_stitch 20 sts *work in the back loop only for round 3 round 3-12 chain 1 make 1 half_double_crochet in each st around join with a slip_stitch 20 sts *fasten_off make sure to stuff before sewing to the couch back rest orange row 1 chain 13 start in the second chain from the hook make 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 11 sts in the last st make 5 half_double_crochet * now you should notice your work is turning let it turn and continue working on the other side like a spiral now in the rest of the 11 sts make 1 half_double_crochet in each st across 27 sts *work in the front loop for round 2 only row 2-26 chain 1 turn make 1 half_double_crochet in each st across 27 sts *work
